page.title: 10PLEASURELAND IN ARBROATH
page.content: On May 14th 1985.we heard that Pleasureland was reopening after its winter break thanks to a local radio{ {communication}.On May 18th.we took our bikes down.Richard's dad was the first on the dodgems.Richard had to pay for both of us to get on.It was quite busy because a lot of people had heard of the {event}.We had a lot of fun bumping into each other on the dodgems.Then we went on the ghost train which is popular with most of the{tourists}but a little bit scary, especially when the skeleton touched Alan.We left the ghost train and went on to the arcade games.Richard was on the Turbo,a racing car game,Alan was on a Star Wars game,and Richard's dad was on the pinball.Lots of people seem to enjoy their{recreation}at Pleasureland.
